S

SaveInput - Class in org.jgrapes.io.events
Causes the FileStorage component to write the data from all Input events on the channel that this event is fired on to a file until an event with the end of record flag set is sent on the channel.
SaveInput(Path, OpenOption...) - Constructor for class org.jgrapes.io.events.SaveInput
Creates a new instance.
SaveOutput - Class in org.jgrapes.io.events
Causes the FileStorage component to write the data from all Output events on the channel that this event is fired on to a file until an event with the end of record flag set is sent on the channel.
SaveOutput(Path, OpenOption...) - Constructor for class org.jgrapes.io.events.SaveOutput
Creates a new instance.
SELF - Static variable in interface org.jgrapes.core.Channel
A special channel object that can be passed to the constructor of Component.Component(Channel).
Self - Interface in org.jgrapes.core
An interface that can be used to specify the object itself as channel in handler annotations.

Provides a TCP server.

Creates a new server listening on the given address.
Server(Channel, SocketAddress, int) - Constructor for class org.jgrapes.net.Server
Creates a new server using the given channel and address.
Server.Connection - Class in org.jgrapes.net
The internal representation of a connected client.
setChannels(Channel...) - Method in class org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase
Sets the channels that the event is fired on if no channels are specified explicitly when firing the event (see Manager.fire(Event, Channel...)).

start(AttachedComponent) - Static method in class org.jgrapes.core.Components
Fires a Start event with an associated Started completion event on the broadcast channel of the given application and wait for the completion of the Start event.

An event that causes an application to shut down.
Stop() - Constructor for class org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop
Create a new stop event with the event's channels set to Channel.BROADCAST.
stop() - Method in class org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase
Can be called during the execution of an event handler to indicate that the event should not be processed further.
StreamFile - Class in org.jgrapes.io.events
Causes the content of a file to be streamed as a sequence of Output events (terminated by an event with the end of record flag set) on the channel that this event is fired on.
